languages.text: Изогнутые детали выглядят чужеродными на фоне упорядоченной геометрии мануфакторума. Многочисленные отверстия и крепления указывают на то, что каждый элемент служит лишь частью какой-то жуткой конструкции.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Огромные металлические части явно для сборки какой-то твари

languages.text: The curved parts appear foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.
languages.original_text: Изогнутые детали выглядят чужеродными на фоне упорядоченной геометрии мануфакторума. Многочисленные отверстия и крепления указывают на то, что каждый элемент служит лишь частью какой-то жуткой конструкции.

traits.locale_text: The curved parts look foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.
The curved parts look foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.
The curved parts look foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.
The curved parts look foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.
The curved parts appear foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.
The curved parts appear foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.

languages.text: 在制造工厂有序的几何形状之中，这些扭曲的零件看起来似乎格格不入。上面无数孔洞与紧固件表明，每个部件都只是某台更大的邪恶机器的一部分。
languages.original_text: The curved parts appear foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.

traits.locale_text: 在制造工厂有序的几何形状之中，这些扭曲的零件看起来似乎格格不入。上面无数孔洞与紧固件表明，每个部件都只是某台更大的邪恶机器的一部分。

languages.text: Las partes curvas no encajan con la ordenada geometría del manufactorum. Los muchos agujeros y tornillos muestran que cada componente no es más que una pieza de un diseño maligno y complejo.
languages.original_text: The curved parts appear foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.

traits.locale_text: Las partes curvas no encajan con la ordenada geometría del manufactorum. Los muchos agujeros y tornillos muestran que cada componente no es más que una pieza de un diseño maligno y complejo.

languages.text: 曲がったパーツは、聖工場の形の整ったものと比べると、異様な印象を受ける。あちこちに空いた穴と締め金具が、どのパーツもまさに悪しき設計の役割を担っていることを示していた。
languages.original_text: The curved parts appear foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.

traits.locale_text: 曲がったパーツは、聖工場の形の整ったものと比べると、異様な印象を受ける。あちこちに空いた穴と締め金具が、どのパーツもまさに悪しき設計の役割を担っていることを示していた。

languages.text: Die gekrümmten Teile wirken fremdartig, verglichen mit der geordneten Geometrie des Manufactorums. Die vielen Löcher und Befestigungen deuten darauf hin, dass jede Komponente einem ganz bestimmten Zweck im Rahmen eines ausgefeilten Plans dient.
languages.original_text: The curved parts appear foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.

traits.locale_text: Die gekrümmten Teile wirken fremdartig, verglichen mit der geordneten Geometrie des Manufactorums. Die vielen Löcher und Befestigungen deuten darauf hin, dass jede Komponente einem ganz bestimmten Zweck im Rahmen eines ausgefeilten Plans dient.

languages.text: Les parties courbées se démarquent nettement de la géométrie ordonnée du manufactorum. Les nombreux trous et fixations laissent penser que chaque composant n'est qu'une partie d'un tout bien plus vaste et corrompu.
languages.original_text: The curved parts appear foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.

traits.locale_text: Les parties courbées se démarquent nettement de la géométrie ordonnée du manufactorum. Les nombreux trous et fixations laissent penser que chaque composant n'est qu'une partie d'un tout bien plus vaste et corrompu.

languages.text: Kavisli parçalar, manufaktorumun düzenli geometrisine hiç uymuyor. Manufaktorumun üzerinde sayısız delik ve somun, her parçanın bu tuhaf düzenekte bir görevi olduğunu gösteriyor.
languages.original_text: The curved parts appear foreign compared to the orderly geometry of the manufactorum. The many holes and fasteners indicate that each component serves as but a single part of some wicked design.

traits.locale_text: Kavisli parçalar, manufaktorumun düzenli geometrisine kıyasla yabancı geliyor. Üzerindeki sayısız delik ve somunlar, her parçanın bu tuhaf düzenekte bir görev aldığını gösteriyor.
